mapper.sql: SELECT id, `name`, create_time createDatetime, ifnull(data.browses, 0) as browses, ifnull(data.likes, 0) as likes, ifnull(data.docAmount, 0) as docAmount FROM `doc_category` left join ( select document.category_id as category_id, sum(document.likes) as likes, sum(document.browses) as browses, count(document.id) as docAmount from document group by document.category_id )as data on data.category_id = id
mapper.insert: insert into doc_category(id, name, create_time) values(#{id},#{name},#{createDatetime})
mapper.update: update doc_category set name=#{newName} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select distinct ifnull(data.docAmount, 0) as docAmount from `doc_category` left join ( select document.category_id as category_id, count(document.id) as docAmount from document group by document.category_id )as data on data.category_id = #{id}
